sentence: the arrc was charged with providing the market with the tools that would be needed for a transition from libor: an alternative rate that did not share the same structural instabilities that have led libor to this point, a plan to develop liquidity in the derivatives market for this new rate so that cash users could hedge their interest rate risk, and models of better contract language that helped limit the risk from a libor disruption.
label: LABEL_2

sentence: issuers should demand it of themselves, and investors should demand it of issuers.
label: LABEL_2

sentence: as can be seen in our recently published enhanced descriptions of the supervisory stress-test models, the interest rate variables that drive projections of net interest income under stress are the yield on 10-year treasury bonds, the yield on 3-month treasury bills, and the 10-year triple-b corporate yield.3 that is, the supervisory projections of net interest income are primarily based on models that implicitly assume that other rates such as libor or sofr move passively with short-term treasury rates.
label: LABEL_2
